about_the_game:
SCP: Infohazard is a survival horror game based on the stories of the SCP Foundation, where you take on the role of a test subject who becomes the survivor or a reality-bending disaster. To survive, you must restore reality fragments around the facility while avoiding some of the most dangerous monsters and anomalies that they contain. You must navigate through the high-tech facility and to find a way to stop what might just be an end-of-the-world scenario.

SCP: Infohazard immerses you in the inner workings of The SCP Foundation like never before, with breathtaking details, clever puzzles, heart-pounding stealth, combat, and more. Use the environment to your advantage as you avoid detection, shoot around corners, distract the monstrous anomalies, and more.

Infohazard includes collaboration from voice actors, writers, and artists from all over the SCP community, bringing the Foundation to life like never before.

Featured Contributors and Partners

The Infohazard team includes experienced and well-known writers, artists and content creators of the SCP Foundation Community!

TheeSherm (Site-42)

Sherm, better known as Theron Sherman of Site-42, is a prolific member of the SCP community, creating content for over 3 million Tiktok followers as well as nearly a million subscribers on Youtube. Sherm produces high quality SCP Content, including SCP Reading Audio Podcasts, Video Readings, Livestreams, and independent films.

The Desk of Alto Clef

Born of the primal fires of Mordor, The Desk of Alto Clef was forged via ancient blood rituals of the daevite (the SCP GOI) people. This not only makes The Desk nearly indestructible but allows him to bend reality and space time itself. (Joking aside he is the quindecinnial Alto Clef with works ranging from Cosplay, Voice Acting, Gaming and is considered by most to be the real life embodiment of the character itself!)

SorsHasOars (Overseer_O5_1)

SorsHasOars is a seasoned digital artist with 15 years of experience, known for their captivating portrayal of Overseer O5-1. As an O5-1 cosplayer and SCP content creator on TikTok, they produce engaging videos that resonate with the SCP community. Currently, they are working on a 72-card tarot deck featuring fellow SCP TikTok creators and developing a collaborative video series centered on the O5 Council.

Leeman Kessler (Mayor Lovecraft)

Leeman Kessler, better known as Mayor Lovecraft, is the real-life Mayor of Gambier, Ohio and a prolific content creator in Lovecraftian horror content.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains violence, some gore, and thematic horror
